frameworkcode.description: framework used in cataloging this record

holdingbranch.description: library that is currently in possession of this holding

location.description: authorized value for the shelving location for this holding

ccode.description: authorized value for the collection code for this holding

suppress.description: Boolean indicating whether the record is suppressed in OPAC

timestamp.description: date and time this recird was last altered

datecreated.description: the date this record was added to Koha

deleted_on.description: the date this record was deleted from Koha
